text:
I send messages to Telegram as each market settles with running P&L and a few other stats.

I have an app on my phone (and soon a summary to my watch I hope) where I push more detailed stats, results and selections for upcoming races.

text:
All of above tbh, obviously this is probably just relevant to me and my way of thinking.

After reading a paper I am normally just left confused and the books out there normally tell you what you already know but with a few anecdotes to make it interesting.

In context after talking to others I am immediately inspired to start looking at either new areas or approaching what I do slightly differently. Normally it’s this different approach which unlocks parts of what I have previously struggled with or stopped me ‘pushing’ a particular signal. I personally have never got this from books or papers.

As an example I was talking to George about thinking outside the box on Wednesday evening and it made me realise my current way of thinking (and working) isn’t even close to what I should be doing.

elements.text: All of above tbh, obviously this is probably just relevant to me and my way of thinking.
After reading a paper I am normally just left confused and the books out there normally tell you what you already know but with a few anecdotes to make it interesting.

In context after talking to others I am immediately inspired to start looking at either new areas or approaching what I do slightly differently. Normally it’s this different approach which unlocks parts of what I have previously struggled with or stopped me ‘pushing’ a particular signal.
I personally have never got this from books or papers.
As an example I was talking to George about thinking outside the box on Wednesday evening and it made me realise my current way of thinking (and working) isn’t even close to what I should be doing.
